summary: This is an email chain regarding a request for Thomas' work schedule, likely in connection with the Epstein death investigation. The email involves a Federal Protective Service Special Agent and another individual discussing obtaining the schedule.

persons.name: Thomas
persons.context: The email chain is about requesting Thomas' work schedule, presumably in relation to the Epstein death investigation.

persons.name: CPP
persons.context: A Special Agent with the Federal Protective Service (Region 2) is involved in the email exchange regarding obtaining Thomas' work schedule for the Epstein death investigation.

connections.description: CPP, a Federal Protective Service Special Agent, is seeking Thomas' work schedule as part of the Epstein death investigation.

events.title: Request for work schedule in Epstein death investigation
events.description: An email exchange occurs where a Federal Protective Service Special Agent discusses obtaining Thomas' work schedule in connection with the Epstein death investigation.

keyFacts: The Federal Protective Service was involved in the Epstein death investigation, specifically seeking an individual's work schedule.
The subject of the inquiry is an individual named Thomas, whose work schedule was requested.
The document is an email chain showing coordination or information gathering related to the investigation into Epstein's death.
